title: 计算器消耗42GB内存，AI连生产数据库都删了？
description: 这并不是又一篇谴责技术的过时文章，而是来自一线工程师的冷静诊断。
titleZh: 计算器消耗42GB内存，AI连生产数据库都删了？
titleEn: Calculator Consumes 42GB of Memory, AI Even Deletes Production Database? Giants Invest 364 Billion Frenziedly, Yet Can't Save the "Total Collapse" of Software Quality...

descriptionEn: The dragon-slayer ultimately became enamored with the dragon's treasure trove. title: AI人格分裂被证实：30万个棘手问题为OpenAI和谷歌撕下“无花果叶”
description: 如何科学地“挑剔”大模型？
titleZh: AI人格分裂被证实：30万个棘手问题为OpenAI和谷歌撕下“无花果叶”
titleEn: AI Split Personality Confirmed: 300,000 Tricky Questions Tear Off the "Fig Leaf" for OpenAI and Google
descriptionZh: 如何科学地“挑剔”大模型？
descriptionEn: How to scientifically "nitpick" large models? Anthropic partnered with Thinking Machines on new research, using 300,000 scenario designs and extreme stress tests to expose the "personas" of AI from OpenAI, Google, and Musk's company. So, who's the pushover? And who's the efficiency maniac?
